description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Sounio, Greece. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.vendor_name: Cape Sounio, A Grecotel Resort to Live
hotels.title: Stylish Athens Riviera Hideaway near Temple of Poseidon with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
hotels.description: If you're dreaming of a Greek paradise with golden sands and turquoise waters, this is the resort for you. Located in Sounio, this modern oasis is set against a backdrop of rugged coastline and clear blue waters, with glimpses of the Temple of Poseidon in the distance. Find yourself surrounded by expansive private beaches and cool off in the dazzling outdoor swimming pool. Dining is a journey in itself at this chic resort. Start off with light bites at the open-air Panorama Lounge Bar, where sunset views over the bay set a relaxed mood, or for something truly special, make your way to The Restaurant, the flagship spot serving an incredible Mediterranean-inspired menu. Spend your days exploring the majestic site of the Temple of Poseidon or traverse the walking routes through the picturesque Sounio National Park.

hotels.vendor_name: Cape Sounio, A Grecotel Resort to Live
hotels.title: Athens Riviera Luxury near Temple of Poseidon with Seven Dining Venues & Spa
hotels.description: Dreaming of a Greek paradise? This resort in Sounio offers golden sands, turquoise waters and stunning views of the Temple of Poseidon. Enjoy expansive private beaches and a large swimming pool, then dine with a view at the open-air lounge bar or indulge in Greek-fusion cuisine at the onsite restaurants. Explore the Temple of Poseidon or picturesque Sounio National Park. For a day trip, Athens is just an hour away, giving you easy access to the best of the city, including the Acropolis Museum, Parthenon and Mount Lycabettus cable car.

seo.title: Hotel a Sounio - Greece Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Sounio, Greece con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
